title: 2019 Week 15 Preview
itunes:title: 2019 Week 15 Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal preview each of the upcoming week 15 games including the Texans at Titans (6:40), the Bears at Packers (23:14), and the Patriots at Bengals (46:50). Marc Sessler talks about his upcoming trip to the Black Hole (1:08:12) and the heroes preview the Sunday night (1:14:45) and Monday night games. (1:20:00)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
